posts.name: Luca Giovanny
posts.content: If we're strictly talking body count, then I'm a morning person.

posts.name: Luca Giovanny
posts.content: Then a white guy laughed at his own joke with an intensity that hinted at a darkness within.

posts.name: Tesla Windows
posts.content: If I weigh 400 pounds and can lift 600 pounds, shouldn't I be able to fly by lifting the chair I'm sitting in?

posts.name: Vito Corleone
posts.content: As a man, it's impossible to walk passed a punching bag and not hit it twice before walking away.

posts.name: Vito Corleone
posts.content: 6:30 is the best time on a clock hands down
